trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含中的单元格的边框样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制可以完全自定义其外观，包括单元格和标头的边框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>允许你设置的单元格边框外观的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你需要进一步自定义边框，DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle 类，可设置每条边的单元格的边框的样式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle 属性分别表示左、 右、 上边框和的单元格、 下边框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置这些属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>来生成各种单元格之间的边框外观。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所有单元格的边框的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>属性未设置为相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值，所有的属性值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性指定的值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>。
